page.title: 12A TYPICAL DAY IN NAILSTONE
page.content: Any Monday in the life of a ten year old girl. I get up at{7 a.m.,}get dressed, go down stairs for my breakfast, I have Coco Pops. I have a wash and clean my teeth, comb my hair and put on my shoes and coat. I walk to the bus stop and get on when the bus comes.When I get to school the bell rings at{9 a.m. we work and then go into assembly. We go swimming at Ibstock High School by bus. When we come back playtime has already started and the tuck shop is closed. We do our spellings and then go in to the hall to have our dinner. At dinner time we play outside and at {1.15 p.m.}we go in to work again. At {3.10 p.m.}we catch the school bus home. I get home at about{3.25 p.m., } have my dinner at{4 p.m.}and then watch television or play outside until I go to bed at about{8.30 p.m.}
